name: heisLucid
description:
INSTRUCTIONS :

[WASD] keys to move 

Aim with mouse and attack with LMB

Avoid spikes and enemies.

Just load the game and wait :)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

heisLucid

Help Lucid fight Redbull, TikBlob and the boss Jim so he can have peace when livestreaming.

-

CREDITS -

Thanks for playing, I'm not a game dev, my goal is not to make games, I made 2 games in total, which both of them used a premade engine. I just thought it would be cool to reskin and add some elements, so I remixed them. Thank you.
